name: attach Kevlar harness to labrador
description: You have nearly finished sizing and attaching a Kevlar dog harness to this Labrador.  Activate to fasten the last straps.

use_action.friendly_msg: You fasten the last straps to the dog and set it loose.

name: attach Kevlar harness to attack labrador
description: You have nearly finished sizing and attaching a Kevlar dog harness to this trained attack Labrador.  Activate to fasten the last straps.

use_action.friendly_msg: You fasten the last straps to the dog and set it loose.

name: remove Kevlar harness from labrador
description: You have nearly removed the Kevlar harness from this Labrador.  Activate to undo the last straps.

use_action.friendly_msg: You finish removing the armor and release the dog.

name: remove Kevlar harness from attack labrador
description: You have nearly removed the Kevlar harness from this trained attack Labrador.  Activate to undo the last straps.

use_action.friendly_msg: You finish removing the armor and release the dog.
